sys_script_include.name: getUserData

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8a31eaaa479d461042ea995b116d4321
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1366185_dnb_cars.getUserData</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>getUserData</name><script><![CDATA[var getUserData = Class.create();
getUserData.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    GetName: function() {
        var loggedUserId = this.getParameter("sysparm_user_name");
        var ret = ''; // Initialize ret variable

        // Create a new GlideRecord for the 'sys_user' table
        var grUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        grUser.addQuery("sys_id", loggedUserId);
        grUser.query();

        // Check if any user record is found with the given user ID
        if (grUser.next()) {
            // Retrieve the user name from the user record
            ret = grUser.user_name;
        }

        // Return the user name
        return ret;
    },
    type: 'getUserData'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>BenAdmin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-04 14:00:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>8a31eaaa479d461042ea995b116d4321</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getUserData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DNB CarSharing" source="x_1366185_dnb_cars">8fc58fe5479d021042ea995b116d43ba</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="DNB CarSharing">8fc58fe5479d021042ea995b116d43ba</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8a31eaaa479d461042ea995b116d4321</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>BenAdmin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-04 14:10:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
